typetodo.model

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • typetodo.model.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeadlineTask, FloatingTask, TimedTask

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to create 3 types of task, namely, TimedTask, Deadline Task, Floating Task
    Author:
    Phan Shi Yu
